info.name: FE Heroes Gamepedia Wiki Clean Up
info.description:
Cleans up the wiki and removes ads.

Tested in Chrome, with adblock, and logged in.

If you spot any errors, please contact me: @Sei#2975 on Discord, @XinChun93 on Twitter, /u/yaycupcake on Reddit.
I'm also DiscoOmastar on Twitch and Gamepedia, but I don't often check messages there.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.5
October 16, 2017

Change log:

Version 1.5 (October 16, 2017)
- Fixed z-index of user dropdown to stay in front of other elements.

Version 1.4.1 (September 10, 2017)
- Slight update, removes a border that's in the way.

Version 1.4 (September 10, 2017)
- Gamepedia updated some ID and class names, so the stylesheet has been updated accordingly.

Version 1.3 (July 20, 2017)
- Sidebar ad removed.

Version 1.2 (April 22, 2017)
- Bottom ads should be gone even without adblock now. (If you still see them, please let me know!)

Version 1.1 (April 19, 2017)
- The user menu is now at least 150px wide, regardless of your username's length, so "Talk" and "My User Page" do not overlap.
- Slightly updated description.
- Added example URL

Version 1.0 (April 19, 2017)
- Initial Release

data.title: really good thx please make dark version better for eyes
